attributes.action: people 14 years old and upwards to be allowed at music festivals and concerts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
if they have permission from parents and buy a ticket they have every right to be there.
they dont want to cause harm or offence they just want fun

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
